A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Force awakens came to us 2 years ago\, giving us a fresh new view on the Star Wars universe\, The Last Jedi  does very well telling this new take on the univeres amazingly. It may have some flaws all movies do\, but this movie\, made me sad\, happy\, excited\, put me at the edge of my seat\, made me laugh\, it was a great ride. It was a good way to continue the skywalker legacy. I give this a 5/5 because I have no isuse with it.
